author: geirm
msg: Promoted DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE to be a constant in VelocityServlet, not in Runtime, as
we are removing default.contentType as a property - it doesn't make sense as a velocity
property as it's something that servlet specific.
With the setContentType() overridable method, as well as the ease in which props can be
overridden an controlled in this class, this seems to be ok.
If this is incorrect, howl now...
